remarks.format: ## Remarks 是可以用來接收和顯示筆墨輸入項目。An is an element that can be used to receive and display ink input. 這通常是用手寫筆互動與數位板產生使用 stylus 或 mouse 筆墨筆劃。This is commonly done through the use of a stylus, which interacts with a digitizer to produce ink strokes using a stylus or a mouse. 建立的筆觸會表示為物件，而且可以是以程式設計方式管理，或根據使用者輸入。The created strokes are represented as objects, and can be manipulated either programmatically or based on user input. 可讓使用者修改或刪除現有。The enables users to modify or delete an existing . 可以繫結至資料來源。The can be bound to a data source. 例如，您可以繫結屬性： base 64，編碼的字串，包含資料筆跡序列化格式 (ISF)，或甚至的筆墨另一個屬性。For example, you can bind the property to: a base-64, encoded string that contains ink data in Ink Serialized format (ISF); or even to the property of another . 您可以也將屬性繫結，例如和，其他資料來源。You can also bind properties, such as and , to other data sources. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以模擬同時具有畫筆與螢光筆在同一個使用。The following example demonstrates how to simulate the use of both a pen and a highlighter on the same . 這個範例假設標記語言 (XAML) 檔案中的根項目是呼叫`root`。The example assumes that the root element in the markup language (XAML) file is a called `root`. 它也假設有呼叫`switchHighlighter`且同時和事件都已連接到範例的事件處理常式。It also assumes that there is a called `switchHighlighter` and that both the and events are connected to the example's event handler.
